opis: KUĆA MATULJI BLIZINA CENTRA !! Prodaje se prekrasna katnica s prostranom okućnicom u centru Matulja! Ova šarmantna kuća, smještena 900 m od samog centra Matulja, savršen je spoj udobnosti i funkcionalnosti, uz dodatan luksuz velike, prostrane okućnice koja nudi bezbroj mogućnosti za uživanje na otvorenom. Prizemlje: Manji stan koji se sastoji od dvije spavaće sobe, prostranog dnevnog boravka s modernom kuhinjom te kupaonice. Idealan je za ugodan obiteljski život ili kao zasebna stambena jedinica za goste ili najam. Kat: Veći stan s tri svijetle spavaće sobe, od kojih jedna ima izlaz na terasu s koje se pruža predivan pogled. Dnevni boravak i kuhinja povezani su u otvoreni prostor koji odiše svjetlošću i prostranošću. Kupaonica je moderno uređena, čineći ovaj stan idealnim za veću obitelj. Okućnica: Velika, uređena okućnica nudi prostor za opuštanje, dječju igru, vrtlarstvo ili čak izgradnju bazena. Ova privatna oaza omogućava bijeg od svakodnevice, a istovremeno ste blizu svih gradskih sadržaja. Prednosti ove nekretnine: Dva odvojena stana – savršeno za obitelj ili najam Prostrana terasa s pogledom Velika okućnica za opuštanje i rekreaciju Izvrsna lokacija u centru Matulja, blizu svih sadržaja Ne propustite priliku da postanete vlasnik ove prekrasne kuće! Za sve informacije i dogovor za razgledavanje, slobodno nas kontaktirajte. HOUSE IN MATULJI CLOSE TO THE CENTER !! A beautiful two-story house with a spacious garden in the center of Matulji is for sale! This charming house, located 900 m from the center of Matulji, is the perfect combination of comfort and functionality, with the added luxury of a large, spacious garden that offers countless opportunities for enjoying the outdoors. Ground floor: A smaller apartment consisting of two bedrooms, a spacious living room with a modern kitchen and a bathroom. It is ideal for a comfortable family life or as a separate living unit for guests or rental. First floor: A larger apartment with three bright bedrooms, one of which has access to a terrace with a beautiful view. The living room and kitchen are connected into an open space that exudes light and spaciousness. The bathroom is modernly decorated, making this apartment ideal for a larger family. Garden: A large, landscaped garden offers space for relaxation, children's play, gardening or even building a swimming pool. This private oasis allows you to escape from everyday life, while at the same time being close to all city amenities. Advantages of this property: Two separate apartments - perfect for a family or rental Spacious terrace with a view Large garden for relaxation and recreation Excellent location in the center of Matulji, close to all amenities Don't miss the opportunity to become the owner of this beautiful house! For all information and an appointment for a viewing, please feel free to contact us.
